item.description:
It's the usual First Tursday at the Wadsworth Atheneum.  Admission is only $5.00, gets you into the museum, great drinks, free food and a free movie.  It's Australian night. Not sure what it means, but it includes the film "Mad Max".  This is Mel Gibson's first US film release.

In a dystopian Australia of the future, a vicious biker gang murders a cop’s family which makes his fight with them personal. 1979. Australia. 88 min. Rated R. Directed by George Miller. Starring Mel Gibson
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be hanging around upstairs and then in the downstairs lobby before the film.
item.name: Wadsworth Atheneum First Thursday and Free Movie - "Mad Max"
